languages.text: "Вигдис Сурри Отта из династии Толиман, восьмой и ныне действующий Мастер вокса на вашем корабле. По приказу сенешаля приступила к обязанностям сразу после кончины досточтимого Седьмого Мастера, моего деда".

traits.locale_text: "Вигдис Сурри Отта из династии Толиман". {n}Женщина учтиво склоняет глову.{/n} "Восьмой и ныне действующий Мастер Вокса на вашем корабле, Лорд-капитан. По приказу Сенешаля приступила к обязанностям сразу после кончины Седьмого Мастера, моего деда. Как и многие, он погиб вместе с вашей предшественницей во время нападения пиратов".

languages.text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."
languages.original_text: "Вигдис Сурри Отта из династии Толиман, восьмой и ныне действующий Мастер вокса на вашем корабле. По приказу сенешаля приступила к обязанностям сразу после кончины досточтимого Седьмого Мастера, моего деда".

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis Surri Otta from the Toliman dynasty, Vox Master Octavius currently serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders I assumed this duty immediately after the demise of esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

"Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

"Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

"Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

languages.text: «Maestra de vocos Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman, actual maestra de vocos de la nave. Siguiendo órdenes del Senescal, asumí el cargo inmediatamente a la muerte del estimado maestro de vocos Septimus, que era mi abuelo».
languages.original_text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

traits.locale_text: «Maestra de vocos Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman, actual maestra de vocos de la nave. Siguiendo órdenes del Senescal, asumí el cargo inmediatamente a la muerte del estimado maestro de vocos Septimus, que era mi abuelo».

languages.text: “我是来自托里曼王朝第八世音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·奥塔，目前正在您的虚空舰上担任音阵大师。根据总领的命令，尊敬的第七世音阵大师，也就是我的祖父去世之后，我便立即接手了这个职务。”
languages.original_text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

traits.locale_text: “我是来自托里曼王朝的音阵大师，奥克塔维斯·维格迪斯·苏里·奥塔，目前正在您的虚空舰上担任音阵大师。根据总领的命令，尊敬的音阵大师塞普蒂默斯，也就是我的祖父去世之后，我便立即接手了这个职务。”

languages.text: 「ヴォクスマスター・オクタヴァス、トリマン王朝のヴィグディス・スール・アウタ、陛下の宇宙船に乗船する現ヴォクスマスターです。家令長のご用命により、お祖父様であった、尊敬するヴォクスマスター・セプティマスが亡くなってすぐに、この職務を引き受けました」
languages.original_text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクスマスター・オクタヴァス、トリマン王朝のヴィグディス・スール・アウタ、陛下の宇宙船に乗船する現ヴォクスマスターです。家令長のご用命により、お祖父様であった、尊敬するヴォクスマスター・セプティマスが亡くなってすぐに、この職務を引き受けました」

languages.text: "Voxmeisterin Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta von der Dynastie Toliman, die derzeitige Voxmeisterin in Diensten an Bord Eures Schiffs. Ich habe diese Pflicht in Übereinstimmung mit den Befehlen des Truchsess direkt nach dem Dahinscheiden des geschätzten Voxmeisters Septimus übernommen, der mein Großvater war."
languages.original_text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

traits.locale_text: "Voxmeisterin Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta von der Dynastie Toliman, die derzeitige Voxmeisterin in Diensten an Bord Eures Schiffs. Ich habe diese Pflicht in Übereinstimmung mit den Befehlen des Truchsess direkt nach dem Dahinscheiden des geschätzten Voxmeisters Septimus übernommen, der mein Großvater war."

languages.text: « Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman, maîtresse-vox octavus de votre vaisseau. Conformément aux ordres du sénéchal, j'ai endossé ce rôle immédiatement après le décès de l'estimé maître-vox septimus, qui était mon grand-père. »
languages.original_text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

traits.locale_text: « Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman, maîtresse-vox octavus de votre vaisseau. Conformément aux ordres du sénéchal, j'ai endossé ce rôle immédiatement après le décès de l'estimé maître-vox septimus, qui était mon grand-père. »

languages.text: "Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta. Geminizde Voks Üstadı olarak hizmet etmekteyim. Bu görevi saygın bir Voks Üstadı olan dedem Septimus'un kaybı üzerine, Seneşal'in emirleri doğrultusunda üstlendim."
languages.original_text: "Vox Master Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty, the current Vox Master serving aboard your vessel. In accordance with the Seneschal's orders, I assumed this duty immediately upon the demise of the esteemed Vox Master Septimus, who was my grandfather."

traits.locale_text: "Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Octavus Vigdis Surri Otta. Geminizde Voks Üstadı olarak hizmet etmekteyim. Bu görevi saygın bir Voks Üstadı olan büyükbabam Septimus'un kaybı üzerine, Seneşal'in emirleri doğrultusunda üstlendim."
